description: Front-End Engineer, working on the web.
i-am: I make things on the web.
about-tldr: I'm Glenn, a Freelance Front-End Engineer from Vienna, Austria. I build web apps with React and learn a lot from the open-source community.
about-resume: In the past, I've built internal React applications at Styria and websites for ProSiebenSat.1, Volkswagen and more, at nexxar.
about-private: When I'm not coding, I love to spend my time with my lovely wife Charmaine, my family and friends. I enjoy traveling around the world and discover cities and cultures. I love to play the guitar and listen to JM Music.
expertise-1-description: I'm passionate about building amazing web applications using React & Redux.
expertise-2-description: I'm strongly focused on building high-quality products with best user experience and great usability.
expertise-3-description: I've never stopped learning from the open-source community and I love to contribute to new front-end technologies.
contact-connect: If you are interested in working together, just ping me on
